channel.title: Valazar Development
channel.description:
[b]Introduction:[/b] The server has been online for almost two weeks, we've started to work more on the server as we've came down to stop working on the forums as we feel as there almost finished with the help of our second "hired" forum developer. Now that I have someone in my place to work on the forums, I've been doing much community related work, could be various things. Other than that, Jordon and I have been doing our best to make sure the member-base of our community enjoy themselves.
[center] [IMG]http://www.valazar.com/banner.png[/img] [/center]
[center][size=12pt]Features[/size][/center] [center]- 24/7 - Dungeoneering - FullScreen - Gamemodes - 10 Bosses - 8 Minigames - vBulletin - Quick Prayers[/center]
[center][size=12pt]Media[/size][/center] Starter: [center][img]http://screensnapr.com/e/j6nNKe.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Latest Updates[/size][/center] [center][b]Starting on April 4, 2012[/b][/center]
[b]Server:[/b] [code]4-5: *Seperate Highscores for each game mode *Search for user *Navigation Bar *All skills including Dungeoneering, hunting and summoning. (Also displays Construction for future) *Does not save Administrators or owners, saves Moderator's due to the fact Moderator's gain no benefits. *Only saves stats that are level 30 or above *Dungeoneering bug fixed *Hunter EXP fixed
4-6: *Added Plimus Auto Donation *Added Players Online Display on homepage (Auto updated) *Added a TOS page.
4-9: *Transport method to Members area *Method of turning your membership status visibility on and off (The $ sign) *Rocktails now added at members zone, only way to get them is to fish them there(Unless you buy them off players) *Fixed a few of the teleporting bugs, when you teleport to one place it would take you to another. *Added RFD chest to home next to the RFD portal *Added armour and a weapon to the starter. *Somewhat fixed the skillcape store. *Changed the Dominion sword animation
4-10: * Dungeoneering tab changed to achievement tab (Looked ugly) *Fixed see through obsidian cape *Added options to change color of ring of kinship *Added chaotic, farseer and eagle eye kiteshields to dungeoneering rewards *Redesigned the quest tab a little *Further fixed the skillcape store, you can now buy every single skillcape there(Provided you have the level) *Completely rewrote the TokHaar-Kal waves, it is now MUCH harder. *Fixed the rocktail fishing at member zone, requires fishing rod and living minerals. *Added a new tree with new logs to member zone giving elite woodcutters and firemakers a new challenge *Fixed a dicing bug, can no longer roll a 0. *Rewrote the stats for Flameburst defender, Soulwar capes and TokHaar-Kal, all were incorrect and now are identical to RS. *Flameburst defender now untradable *Added Nex Killcount interface, will now show up when at Nex. *Removed Saradomin sword and ancient ceremonial from Assault *Ancient Ceremonial now obtained from Nex's Minions in her chamber *Dragon 2H added to Chaos elemental drops. *Fixed combat level bug *Removed Infinity icon from stores *Fixed members PM's *Invisible client background bug fixed
4-11 *Fixed broken yells *Slew down Rocktail exp a little *Added a Member shop *Moved Nomad to Edgeville Cemetery *Added World 3, BETA - Client
4-16 *Zombies Minigame bugs fixed (that we're aware of) *Player Online List
4-19 *Bonecrusher *Member zone store. *Rocktail noting. *Time online *NPC statistics *Yell Fixed *Two unknown dupes fixed. *Announcement when someone reaches level 99.
4-21 *Rocktail Cooking (Members Only) *Slayer tasks redone *More items added to member shop *Tormented Demon count fixed [/code]
[b]Forums:[/b] [code]4-4: * Hightlight Orange Theme
4-7: * Custom Postbit CSS for member information * IdealGray Theme
4-8: * New user ranks have been added * Titles have been removed from the postbit because they are not needed with the new user ranks. * Added a new user tagging system. * Added "Ingame Name" and "Ingame Rank" fields. * Buy Membership has been added to the navbar and the subscription can now be utilized. * Removed 'Leaderboard' navigational tab
4-9: * Rules HTML page redone * Added "Music", "Pictures", and "Videos" sub-boards on the media category * Renamed 'Forum Suggestions' to 'Website Suggestions'
4-11 *Multiple Theme Chooser
4-17 *Redone Webpage
4-18 *Shoutbox for Webclient *Cleaned Webclient page *Redone the 'Vote' page[/code]
Client Updates: [code] 4-19 *Client fixed for most people *NPC head animations shown in chats etc. [/code]
[center][b][size=14pt]Zombie Minigame Update Log[/size][/b][/center] Completed Progress Not Started
Add all zombie attack animations Add all zombie death animations Configure zombie waves to spawn depending on your location Add teleport to zombies. Add checks for smuggling. Add starting equipment and checks Add interface displaying statistics in top left corner as well as in achievement tab Add reward of points with formula (Score / 10) + (Wave * 2) Finish starting room Zombies follow you wherever you are (Don't get stuck or lost) Finish open land room Finish temple Random chance of food when killing Zombies Gain points and score from defeating Zombies Doors and chests require points to open Add hellhounds with correct animations Add Monkey zombies with correct animations Add a random box Add a rewards store Support for teams (May not be released with update)
Pictures of Zombie Minigame: [center][img]http://screensnapr.com/e/9PMvCq.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://screensnapr.com/e/W0oIB3.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://screensnapr.com/e/p4nNXd.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://screensnapr.com/e/gM5Rq0.jpg[/img][/center]
Pictures of additions to website: We've added an item database, kind of like a drop guide but big as Hell. [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/ZDIbSY.jpg[/img] Example: [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/KdHMRm.jpg[/img]
We've also added an question and answer database. [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/LjtQQg.jpg[/img] Example: [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/SeypSj.jpg[/img]

item.title: Valazar Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Forum Updates:

4-26

*Donation has been changed to 'Shopping'
*Revised the main shopping page, made the text easier to understand, fixed links, basic tweaks throughout it etc.
*All navigation bars now say "Shop" instead of "Purchase"

4-28

*Added a new download page, http://valazar.com/download/. You are now taken to that page when you click a link that says "Download", and you can download the client from there.
*Added a quick navigation bar to the bottom of website pages (not the forum), just a somewhat useful thing to have for if someone is at the bottom of a page and wants to navigate - *Note: due to speed issues, this feature is only on the homepage and webclient pages.
*Tweaks made to the Hiscores page.
*The Webclient page can now be found at http://valazar.com/webclient/, instead of http://valazar.com/webclient.php. The Java 6 webclient can now be found at http://valazar.com/webclient/j6.php, and the Java 7 webclient can now be found at http://valazar.com/webclient/j7.php.
*Forum and website navbars are now up-to-date.
*You can now sign up for an account on the actual Valazar website! To do this, you can go to http://valazar.com/user/ and click "Register". Once you register and log in, you will be able to access the Member Zone, which is only accessible to people who have an account. As of now there is nothing on it, but there will soon be exlusive content.

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar Development
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Well at least I’ll know who to go to if I want to get permission I guess lol

Edit: James… I’m sorry but your developer Richie REALLY shouldn’t be developing for you…

Originally Posted by Funny Perhaps grateful isn't the word, but you shouldn't act like you don't care at any rate. You should be encouraging others to actually give CC besides myself.

Feel free to ask James he can even tell you the template is overused <3

Nice to know you aren’t abusive 0.o Been on too many servers/forums where there are abusive staff

Originally Posted by Richie If I don't care about something I'm not going to pretend like I do.
Just admitted to not caring about the site etc LOL
Originally posted by Richie: Don't twist my words.

-We are talking about how a person gives good CC about the current website state.
-Developer states that he isn’t going to pretend that he likes something when he doesn’t
-OP points out what you just implied
-Developer says I am twisting words? ~^ Posted that on Mopar for James to view… 0.o I didn’t twist anything your the one who said it.

Edit #2 he just deleted the last part from my post :fp:

Edit #3 Now I am REALLY laughing. There was an “update” about ::players being shown on an interface? really? …

James I am sorry but I have to question now who you are working with.

Edit #4 Please read the pm I sent you on forums. Make sure to delete my character account as well so it isn’t on the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:94, topic:439217”]GL but also some entity animations might be corrupted and the animations wont work with the npcs, like some npcs when using their animation on a loading 600+ server animation wont work, and some models are messed up (Could be a different npc)

But gl with zombie minigame :)[/quote]
Yes, that’s the problem I hate with loading such higher graphics on a 317 revision. Thanks though!

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:93, topic:439217”]Your “developer” named Richie is quite ungrateful when somebody gives feedback… it was purely good CC feel free to read it on the forums

to be totally honest I am somewhat turned off from the server now he makes it sound like it he doesn’t really care for the site etc.[/quote]

Sigh
I will have to go through that whole entire process of being fair thing, thanks for letting me know.

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:90, topic:439217”]send me the t errors that are being displayed. It’s either an exceptionerror, a null error, or a t error that is crashing it.

If it doesn’t load it then it’s cache related.[/quote]
Well, I have to find someone that has gotten the errors and allow them to run the CMD file.

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar Development
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:89, topic:439217”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=541918.msg3972906#msg3972906 date=1334337500]
lol a “couple more things”

People donate to get an unfair advantage over the lower class (the players who cannot afford to donate such large amounts) to show that they are a higher superior compared to every other regular player.
[/quote]
Nothing I can do about that to be honest. Trust me, if in the future I can allow people to ONLY donate for the title and POSSIBLY the area of the (donator area), I would remove EVERYTHING else.

Update: Jordon is aware of the thing with the client, he’s not aware what’s wrong with it, however, he’ll be looking into it.[/quote]send me the t errors that are being displayed. It’s either an exceptionerror, a null error, or a t error that is crashing it.

If it doesn’t load it then it’s cache related.

Read full topic
